Package org.apache.jena.rdfxml.xmlinput1.impl

Class XMLContext

java.lang.Object
org.apache.jena.rdfxml.xmlinput1.impl.AbsXMLContext
org.apache.jena.rdfxml.xmlinput1.impl.XMLContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
ARPErrorNumbers
public class XMLContext extends AbsXMLContext implements ARPErrorNumbers
Both the baseURI and the lang may be tainted with errors. They should not be accessed without providing a taint object to propagate such tainting.
